text: 3.18-19: Zo 1.16; Ro 10.3; 10.11-12; Ef 1.18; 1.23; Kor 2.2; 2.9-10Nde maaŋ muuŋgirga, nde za Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigi phorgɨp ŋkasŋka ndiv, nde guigira Krais won ndavar nde ndɨɨi tɨva kaŋgirga. Mba tɨv, ana guigira kɨvgiap, guigira mpeeŋgiap, guigira vun mbar ndav, guigira nɨɨn mbar vergi. Ahaŋ, Krais, ana guigira wo ndavar za kha gumgi gu mbigi ga ndɨɨi tɨv, ana guigira za mba ndɨkndɨgi kambarigi. Nde vhɨra tuituigira ana kaŋgiri. Fhe Bakɨme vhɨra tɨvir vhuuiŋ guigira anan givigi, mba tɨvi vhɨra nde givarga.”
